mapper.sql: t.id, t.initiatorId, t.title, t.category, t.mode,t.purpose, t.location, t.coverUrl,t.startSignImgUrl, t.endSignImgUrl, t.dendline, t.startDate, t.endDate, t.volunteerNum, t.clazz, t.volunteerPoints, t.parterNum, t.parterPoints, t.remark, t.coinconfigId, t.status, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.lastModifyUserId, t.lastModifyUserName, t.lastModifyDate,ar.status as arStatus,s.orgName

t.id, t.initiatorId, t.title, t.category, t.mode,t.purpose, t.location, t.coverUrl,t.startSignImgUrl, t.endSignImgUrl, t.dendline, t.startDate, t.endDate, t.volunteerNum, t.clazz, t.volunteerPoints, t.parterNum, t.parterPoints, t.remark, t.coinconfigId, t.status, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.lastModifyUserId, t.lastModifyUserName, t.lastModifyDate
mapper.select: select a.id, a.initiatorId, a.title, a.category, a.mode,a.purpose, a.location, a.coverUrl, a.startSignImgUrl, a.endSignImgUrl, a.dendline, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.volunteerNum, a.clazz, a.volunteerPoints, a.parterNum, a.parterPoints, a.remark, a.coinconfigId, a.status, a.createUserId, a.createUserName, a.createDate, a.lastModifyUserId, a.lastModifyUserName, a.lastModifyDate, a.content, i.headimgurl,s.orgName from activity a -- LEFT JOIN portal.users u ON a.initiatorId=u.user_id LEFT JOIN portal.userinfo i ON a.initiatorId=i.unionid LEFT JOIN society_org_info s ON s.id=a.initiatorId where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into activity (id, initiatorId, title, category, mode, purpose, location, coverUrl, startSignImgUrl,endSignImgUrl, dendline, startDate, endDate, volunteerNum, clazz, volunteerPoints, parterNum, parterPoints, remark, coinconfigId, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, lastModifyUserId, lastModifyUserName, lastModifyDate, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initiatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{endSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dendline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{volunteerNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clazz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{volunteerPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parterPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coinconfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update activity
initiatorId = #{initiatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR},
mode = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coverUrl = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startSignImgUrl = #{startSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endSignImgUrl = #{endSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dendline = #{dendline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
startDate = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endDate = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
volunteerNum = #{volunteerNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clazz = #{clazz,jdbcType=INTEGER},
volunteerPoints = #{volunteerPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parterNum = #{parterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parterPoints = #{parterPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coinconfigId = #{coinconfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update activity set initiatorId = #{initiatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR}, mode = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coverUrl = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startSignImgUrl = #{startSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endSignImgUrl = #{endSignImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dendline = #{dendline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, startDate = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endDate = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, volunteerNum = #{volunteerNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clazz = #{clazz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, volunteerPoints = #{volunteerPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parterNum = #{parterNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parterPoints = #{parterPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coinconfigId = #{coinconfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.sql: from activity t LEFT JOIN activity_report ar on ar.activityId=t.id LEFT JOIN society_org_info s ON s.id=t.initiatorId
from activity t RIGHT JOIN activity_detail ad on t.id=ad.activityId LEFT JOIN activity_report ar on ar.activityId=t.id LEFT JOIN society_org_info s ON s.id=t.initiatorId
